author: Reuters Editorial
title: Gazprom sets 2017 dividend at 8.04 rubles per share: Ifax
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The board of Russian gas producer Gazprom ( GAZP.MM ) has agreed to managementâ€™s proposal for a 2017 dividend of 8.04 rubles ($0.1285) per share, the Interfax news agency reported on Wednesday citing an unnamed source close to the board.
FILE PHOTO: The logo of Russian gas giant Gazprom is seen on a board at the St. Petersburg International Economic Forum 2017 (SPIEF 2017) in St. Petersburg, Russia, June 1, 2017. Picture taken June 1, 2017. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin The company would pay a total of 190 billion rubles in dividends for 2017, Interfax reported.
Gazprom declined to comment.
Reporting by Oksana Kobzeva; writing by Maria Kiselyova; editing by Jason Neely
